text: To Mr. Macmillan, Mr. Gaitskell said the Prime Minister should begin to take seriously the danger of the spread of nuclear weapons within the Nato alliance. "Let us say to Macmillan that he should press, I hope with the agreement of Kennedy, in talks with the Soviet Union, for the establishment in central Europe of a zone of controlled disarmament."
handwritten_text: To Mr. Macmillan, Mr. Gaitskell said the Prime Minister should begin to take seriously the danger of the spread of nuclear weapons within the Nato alliance. "Let us say to Macmillan that he should press, I hope with the agreement of Kennedy, in talks with the Soviet Union, for the establishment in central Europe of a zone of controlled disarmament."
